Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Generative AI tended to give more actionable and detailed feedback and allowed me to make changes and grow.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt like Gen AI cared more about providing feedback and I felt more confident based on their feedback.
